docs.lead_paragraph: The annual appeal is made again for the New York families who are in the greatest distress -- one hundred instances where sickness, poverty and misfortune can be stayed or eliminated.

headline.main: THE 100 NEEDIEST OF THE CITY'S POOR; Again Opportunity Is Given to Prosperity to Aid Poverty at Christmas Time. SUFFERING IN MANY HOMES Speedy Assistance Will Bring Sunshine Into Families in Dire Want. EVERY CENT IS FOR RELIEF Old Friends Anticipate Annual Call and Send $694 -- Six Organiza- tions Back the Appeal.

docs.snippet: The annual appeal is made again for the New York families who are in the greatest distress -- one hundred instances where sickness, poverty and misfortune can be stayed or eliminated.
